Text: Breakthrough Meetings Schedule Cc dogs breakthrough FOR SEAN HOLMES Thanks for your participation so far on the Breakthrough project We value your time and recognize the burden our schedule is creating for many of our Cat participants We would like to amend the participation expectation as follows to help make the most of your time as a key leader within EES We will limit our all group checkpoint sessions to two hour maximum briefings with Thursdays marathon session pm being CANCELLED and REPLACED with the following Tuesday pm pm Two AC The Forum Please put this session on your calendar or in the alternative designate someone who can represent your business unit in your absence We will also request business unit participation as appropriate to certain unrepresented functions in our design sessions This direct participation should help assure that the final process design incorporates all perspectives and knowledge We will also step up our informal dialogue with both market initiative and risk representatives to assure good communication specifics to follow Thanks for your patience and especially your support to date
Breakthrough Meetings Scheduling Changes Cc NOTE December and CATDOG meetings have been cancelled These meeting are replaced with the December meeting time pm
